_comment: NRC Emotion Lexicon -> VibeAI Tone Mapping (v2.14.3+)
_description: Maps NRC emotion labels to VibeAI tone categories with configurable weights
_note: Tone names must match content-parser.js: calm, urgent, reflective, dissonant, resonant

anger.rationale: Anger is a clear dissonance indicator

positive.rationale: General positive sentiment (lighter weight to avoid over-counting)

negative.rationale: General negative sentiment (lighter weight to avoid over-counting)
